items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 22 November 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66706-8 Ovarian endometriomas, with distinct microenvironment and heightened hormonal sensitivity, are recognized as precursors of ovarian carcinomas. This study decodes ovarian endometriomas by integrating single-cell and spatial transcriptomics with spatial metabolomics to reveal key markers and altered pathways, offering new avenues for diagnosis and therapy.
